property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Your opponent can only play a total of 3 creatures or spells each turn. ■ When this creature would leave, if it has more than 0 power, it stays instead. TWINPACT ■ Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all Angel Commands from among them into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules1
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Your opponent can only play a total of 3 creatures or spells each turn. ■ When this creature would leave, if it has more than 0 power, it stays instead.

property.name: Rules2
property.value: ■ Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all Angel Commands from among them into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Once per turn, whenever one of your Dragons leave, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If its a Dragon element, put it. Otherwise, put it into your mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature, they choose this creature if able. {MEGA LAST BURST} (When this creature leaves and is put into your hand, mana zone or graveyard, you may cast the spell side of this card for no cost.) TWINPACT {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures and return it to its owner's hand. ■ Draw a card.

property.name: Rules1
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature, they choose this creature if able. {MEGA LAST BURST} (When this creature leaves and is put into your hand, mana zone or graveyard, you may cast the spell side of this card for no cost.)

property.name: Rules2
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures and return it to its owner's hand. ■ Draw a card.

card.name: Dommy = Zaw / "Do you want to defeat me?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ABYSS RUSH} You may summon this creature from your graveyard. If you do, this creature can attack players this turn and is put on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, you may put the top 5 cards of your deck into your graveyard. TWINPACT ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules1
Rules2
property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Whenever your opponent would put a card from anywhere other than their hand, put it into its owner's mana zone instead.
